content.rendered:
Directed by Shashanka Ghosh

Written by Mehul Suri

Cast Kareena Kapoor (Kalindi Puri). Sonam Kapoor (Avni Malhotra). Swara Bhaskar (Sakshi Soni). Shikha Talsania (Meera Sood Stinson). Sumeet Vyas (Rishab Malhotra). Vishwas Kini (Bhandari). Neena Gupta (Kavita Sharma). Kavita Ghai (Ritu Puri). Vivek Mushran (Kuki Puri). Manoj Pahwa (Mr. Malhotra). Ayesha Raza Mishra (Mrs. Malhotra (as Ayesha Raza)). Alka Badola Kaushal (Santosh Aunty). Ekavali Khanna (Paromita). Sukhesh Arora (Keshav). Anjum Rajabali (Kishanjeet Puri). Ishwak Singh (Nirmal). Kalpana Jha (Shanti) . Antara Bahuguna-Ghosh (DJ (as Cameo)). Gavie Chahal (Keshav). Kamlesh Gill (Dadi). Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman).Shiv Khanna. Muskaan Khubchandani (Young Avni). Babla Kochar (Sakshi’s Father).Akanksha Malhotra. Harpal Singh Pali (Kabir Singh (as Harpal Singh)). Vikash Rajput (Vikash Rajput). Bubbles Sabharwal (Sakshi’s Mother).Javed Shaikh. Surya Sharma (Arjun). Suraj Singh Sinsinwar (Vineet (as Suraj Singh)). Edward Sonnenblick (John Stinson). Kaajal Choudhary (Sister-in-law (uncredited))

Language Hindi

Producers Nikhil Dwivedi. Arundhati Jaiswal. Anil Kapoor. Ekta Kapoor. Rhea Kapoor. Kapil Madnani. Ashwani Mishra. Kulthep Narula. Anup Poddar. Ravi Sarin. Manish Sharma. Ruchikaa Kapoor Sheikh. Yogiraj Shetty.

Production Balaji Motion Picture. Anil Kapoor Film Compan. Anil Kapoor Production
